instructors teaching fellows and local engineers Throughout the 20week course students will meet Mondays and Thursdays from 630930pm from September 20 2021 through March 2022 This course is completely free with ample support from knowledgeable and passionate teaching staff with an exciting professional opportunity waiting at the finish line an apprenticeship with World Wide TechnologybrbrFollowing LC101 students who have completed all assignments will begin a threemonth apprenticeship as a Software Engineer at World Wide Technology In this role apprentices will be an active productive member of an AgileScrum team They will code test debug and deliver software in a teambased environment Throughout the apprenticeship candidates will work fulltime making 20hour plus health insurance benefits At
